great game to play with friends co op is very fun. i loved making my own test chambers too
Really fun, really whitty, and just gets ya brain crackling full of juices
Fan de la saga Portal, recomendado 100%.
S P E E D Y  T H I N G  G O E S  I N.  S P E E D Y  T H I N G  C O M E S  O U T.
If you have never heard of this game before and enjoy first person puzzle games with a dark humoured touch. This is the game for you
Fun game to play with my girlfriend.
It is a very good game where following the laws of physics is key and not useful at the same time, and it is so imaginative you can get stuck into it for ages
This game has actually no downsites from my perspektive, it might not have the best looking graphics, but the in-game xperience is just legendary.

Up there with my favourite games of all time. It's a massive improvement over the first game, with an expanded story and campaign which will provide hours of entertainment and thinking skills.

The game also has a co-op mode and a mode where you can make your own puzzle chambers. What more could you want?

Good value (especially when on sale) and better than the first game in almost every way. 10/10
the game that makes you feel stupid for 12 hours

This game brings me to my happy place alright, the story is compelling, the humor is witty and even as old as it is it's lost none of its charm.

very very good 10/10 i like the story line and so much more mainly the comedy is good so i recamend this game

play it. play portal 1 first. then play it. its just a game that must be played.
bro i   cant describe how good and interesting this game is
An excellent sequel to the first game. The co-op is fun as well, as long as you have someone to play with.
Buen juego para jugar de a dos. te hace pensar mucho. Lo recomiendo si sos normal y no tenes ningun retraso.
